name: Roller Madness (SteelGamer067)
description:
Welcome! This game was made during the Introduction to Game Development course from Michigan State University on Coursera.org.

You can use WASD or Arrow Keys to move around. Collect coins, avoid bouncing cubes. Don't fall off the floor either.

Just download the zip file, extract it and run the "Roller Madness.exe".

Credits: Credits to the rightful owners.
